main: ^Oh my! This is quite disappointing, but I’ve had worse! That’s too bad.
^I’m so sorry…can I offer you a free drink anytime this week?

g-0: ^Hmmm…well, I am too busy right now to wait for a remake, so I’ll take you up on that offer. You better not disappoint me next time, now!

c-2: ^Oh, there’s not much you could do to keep me away. See ya later!
